# AttributedTextSelection.Indices

**Enumeration**

The indices of the current selection.

## Declaration

```swift
@frozen enum Indices
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **AttributedTextSelection.Indices.insertionPoint(_:)**: The index of a single insertion point.
- **AttributedTextSelection.Indices.ranges(_:)**: The range-set of selected characters.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
